mass of an objectweight of an object
Ais measured using a measuring cylinderis measured using a balance
Bis the gravitational force exerted on the objectis the amount of matter in the object
Cis measured in newtonsis measured in kilograms
Dis the same everywherecan vary from place to place
table.latex: \begin{tabular}{|l|p{4cm}|l|} \hline  & mass of an object & weight of an object \\ \hline A & is measured using a measuring cylinder & is measured using a balance \\ \hline B & is the gravitational force exerted on the object & is the amount of matter in the object \\ \hline C & is measured in newtons & is measured in kilograms \\ \hline D & is the same everywhere & can vary from place to place \\ \hline \end{tabular}
